title: Another One For Woody 11-22-2010 [320k MP3]
description:

Warren Haynes and members of the extended GovÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t Mule family celebrated the life and musical legacy of bassist Allen Woody last night. The Another One for Woody benefit show took place at New YorkÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Roseland BallroomÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½the same venue that hosted the original One for Woody benefit a decade agoÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½and raised money for music education in public schools. The performance stretched until nearly 2 AM.
